OOC: Just one request make sure Zardus is at the base also give all you got 
so there are no question about this battle.

::Koj::
Koj looks over everything one more time sighs "somethings missing?"

::Inu-Yasha::
Inu flicks his tail sending something at Koj.

::Koj::
Holds up his arm and the bracelet locks on it"Thats Lilly's I'm ready."

::Inu-Yasha::
Inu smiles "well push the button"

::Koj::
Koj pushs the button and hears the pioneer song."lets do this."

::Inu::
Inu sets the fail safe 48 hours. Grabs the Five stasis pods.  "Ready?"

::Koj::
Koj picks up the Holocubes and the projector. "Ok lets go."  Looking at the 
night sky.
